info.title: LPCC
info.author: Samuel Leong
info.description: Generating LPCC  Features (Linear Predictive Cepstral Coefficients)
info.name: Non-MFCC Features

items.name: LPC Order
items.help: Order of filter used in linear prediction coding. Must be > 0.

items.name: Number of LPCC Coefficients
items.help: Number of LPCC coefficients to use. Must be >= lpc_order + 1
